title: SingBoxConfig
description:
Complete sing-box configuration model.

This model represents the full sing-box configuration with all supported
protocols and features. It is validated against sing-box 1.11.13.

Features:
- 17 inbound protocols (mixed, socks, http, shadowsocks, vmess, vless, 
  trojan, hysteria2, wireguard, tuic, shadowtls, direct, anytls, naive, 
  redirect, tproxy, tun)
- 18 outbound protocols (shadowsocks, vmess, vless, trojan, hysteria2, 
  wireguard, http, socks, tuic, shadowtls, dns, direct, block, selector, 
  urltest, hysteria, anytls, ssh, tor)
- Complete DNS, routing, and experimental features support

users.description: AnyTLS users with name and password.
users.title: Users

client_subnet.description: Client subnet for DNS queries, e.g., '1.2.3.0/24'.
client_subnet.title: Client Subnet

inbound.description: List of inbound tags to match.
inbound.title: Inbound

source_ip_cidr.description: Source IP CIDR ranges to match.
source_ip_cidr.title: Source Ip Cidr

source_port_range.description: Source port ranges to match, e.g., ['80:90'].
source_port_range.title: Source Port Range

tag.description: Unique tag for the DNS server.
tag.title: Tag

address.description: DNS server address, e.g., 8.8.8.8 or https://dns.google/dns-query.
address.title: Address

address_resolver.description: Tag of resolver for this server's address.
address_resolver.title: Address Resolver

MixedInbound.description: Mixed inbound for HTTP and SOCKS.
MixedInbound.title: MixedInbound

users.description: Naive users with username and password.
users.title: Users

timeout.description: Timeout for NTP queries in seconds.
timeout.title: Timeout

RedirectInbound.description: Redirect inbound configuration (Linux and macOS only).
RedirectInbound.title: RedirectInbound

inbound.description: List of inbound tags to match.
inbound.title: Inbound

source_ip_cidr.description: Source IP CIDR ranges to match.
source_ip_cidr.title: Source Ip Cidr

source_port_range.description: Source port ranges to match, e.g., ['80:90'].
source_port_range.title: Source Port Range

outbounds.description: List of outbound tags to select from.
outbounds.title: Outbounds

alpn.description: List of ALPN protocols (e.g., h2, http/1.1).
alpn.title: Alpn

utls.description: uTLS settings for client fingerprinting, e.g., {'fingerprint': 'chrome'}.
utls.title: Utls

TunInbound.description: TUN inbound configuration (Linux, Windows, macOS only).

address.description: IPv4 and IPv6 prefix for the tun interface.
address.title: Address

TunInbound.title: TunInbound

outbounds.description: List of outbound tags to test.
outbounds.title: Outbounds

interval.description: Test interval in seconds or duration string.
interval.title: Interval

users.description: Users with id, alterId, security, e.g., [{'id': 'uuid', 'alterId': 0}].
users.title: Users
